title: A simple, efficient, and rapid method for dye removal from wastewater using an IDA-GO@Fe3O4 magnetic nanocomposite
content:

With the rapid advancement of the dye and textile industry, there has been increasing concern regarding the contamination of wastewater with dyes and its potential influence on human health.
